title: Free modules
content: According to Wikipedia ("Free module", 03-Mar-2019, ~ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Free_module ) "In mathematics, a free module is a module that has a basis - that is, a generating set consisting of linearly independent elements. Every vector space is a free module, but, if the ring of the coefficients is not a division ring (not a field in the commutative case), then there exist non-free modules." The same definition is used in [Lang] p. 135: "By a free module we shall mean a module which admits a basis, or the zero module." In the following, a free module is defined as the direct sum of copies of a ring regarded as a left module over itself, see ~ df-frlm . Since a module has a basis if and only if it is isomorphic to a free module as defined by ~ df-frlm (see ~ lmisfree ), the two definitions are essentially equivalent. The free modules as defined by ~ df-frlm are also taken as a motivation to introduce free modules by [Lang] p. 135.

df-frlm
blocks.content: Define the function associating with a ring and a set the direct sum indexed by that set of copies of that ring regarded as a left module over itself. Recall from ~ df-dsmm that an element of a direct sum has finitely many nonzero coordinates. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Feb-2015.)

blocks.content: Value of the "free module" function. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Feb-2015.)

thm frlmval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(c4, co(c0, cdsmm, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))))))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c0, cfrlm, c2))
} = {
  syl5eq(c4, co(c0, cdsmm, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0)))), co(c0, cfrlm, c2), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(co(c0, cfrlm, c2), co(c0, cdsmm, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  elex(c2, c3)
  ovmpt2(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c2, universe, cfrlm, co(c0, cdsmm, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0)))), co(cv(hs0), cdsmm, cxp(cv(hs1), csn(cfv(crglmod, cv(hs0))))), co(c0, cdsmm, cxp(cv(hs1), csn(cfv(crglmod, c0)))))
  oveq12d(cv(hs0), cdsmm, cxp(cv(hs1), csn(cfv(crglmod, cv(hs0)))), c0, cxp(cv(hs1), csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  xpeq2d(cv(hs1), csn(cfv(crglmod, cv(hs0))), csn(cfv(crglmod, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  sneqd(cfv(crglmod, cv(hs0)), cfv(crglmod, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, crglmod)
  oveq2d(c0, cdsmm, cxp(cv(hs1), csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))), cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  xpeq1(cv(hs1), c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0)))
  df-frlm(hs0, hs1)
  ovex(c0, cdsmm, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cdsmm, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0)))))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(co(c0, cdsmm, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0)))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm frlmval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí c4 =(c0[(+)m](c2 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)})))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(c0[freeLMod]c2)
} = {
  syl5eq(c4, (c0[(+)m](c2 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)})), (c0[freeLMod]c2), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  syl2an(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, (c0[freeLMod]c2)=(c0[(+)m](c2 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)})), c0 ‚àà ùïå, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, c1)
  elex(c2, c3)
  ovmpt2(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c2, universe, cfrlm, (c0[(+)m](c2 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)})), (hs0[(+)m](hs1 √ó {(ringLMod ` hs0)})), (c0[(+)m](hs1 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)})))
  oveq12d(hs0, cdsmm, (hs1 √ó {(ringLMod ` hs0)}), c0, (hs1 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)}), hs0 = c0)
  id(hs0 = c0)
  xpeq2d(hs1, {(ringLMod ` hs0)}, {(ringLMod ` c0)}, hs0 = c0)
  sneqd((ringLMod ` hs0), (ringLMod ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, crglmod)
  oveq2d(c0, cdsmm, (hs1 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)}), (c2 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)}), hs1 = c2)
  xpeq1(hs1, c2, {(ringLMod ` c0)})
  df-frlm(hs0, hs1)
  ovex(c0, cdsmm, (c2 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)}))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((c0[(+)m](c2 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)})))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c((c0[(+)m](c2 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)})))
}

blocks.name: frlmlmod
blocks.content: The free module is a module. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm frlmlmod(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, clmod))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c0, cfrlm, c1))
} = {
  eqeltrd(c3, clmod, co(c0, cdsmm, cxp(c1, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0)))), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)))
  frlmval(c0, crg, c1, c2, c3)
  dsmmlmod(hs0, co(c0, cdsmm, cxp(c1, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0)))), c1, c2, c0, cxp(c1, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wf(cxp(c1, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))), c1, clmod), wcel(cfv(crglmod, c0), clmod))
  adantr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(crglmod, c0), clmod))
  rlmlmod(c0)
  fconst6g(cfv(crglmod, c0), clmod, c1)
  eqtr4d(cfv(csca, cfv(cxp(c1, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))), cv(hs0))), c0, cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, c0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  fveq2d(csca, cfv(cxp(c1, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))), cv(hs0)), cfv(crglmod, c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cfv(cxp(c1, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))), cv(hs0)), cfv(crglmod, c0)))
  fvconst2(cv(hs0), c1, cfv(crglmod, c0))
  fvex(crglmod, c0)
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(c0, cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, c0))))
  rlmsca(c0, crg)
  eqid(co(c0, cdsmm, cxp(c1, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0)))))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(c1, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm frlmlmod(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí c3 ‚àà LMod)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(c0[freeLMod]c1)
} = {
  eqeltrd(c3, clmod, (c0[(+)m](c1 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)})), (c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  frlmval(c0, crg, c1, c2, c3)
  dsmmlmod(hs0, (c0[(+)m](c1 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)})), c1, c2, c0, (c1 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)}), (c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  simpr(c0 ‚àà Ring, c1 ‚àà c2)
  simpl(c0 ‚àà Ring, c1 ‚àà c2)
  syl((c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), ((c1 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)}): c1 ‚Üí LMod), (ringLMod ` c0)‚àà LMod)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà Ring, c1 ‚àà c2, (ringLMod ` c0)‚àà LMod)
  rlmlmod(c0)
  fconst6g((ringLMod ` c0), clmod, c1)
  eqtr4d((Scalar `((c1 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)})` hs0)), c0, (Scalar `(ringLMod ` c0)), ((c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1))
  fveq2d(csca, ((c1 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)})` hs0), (ringLMod ` c0), ((c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1))
  adantl((c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), hs0 ‚àà c1, ((c1 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)})` hs0)=(ringLMod ` c0))
  fvconst2(hs0, c1, (ringLMod ` c0))
  fvex(crglmod, c0)
  ad2antrr(c0 ‚àà Ring, c1 ‚àà c2, hs0 ‚àà c1, c0 =(Scalar `(ringLMod ` c0)))
  rlmsca(c0, crg)
  eqid((c0[(+)m](c1 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)})))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((c1 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)}))
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
}

blocks.name: frlmpws
blocks.content: The free module as a restriction of the power module. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm frlmpws(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(c4, co(co(cfv(crglmod, c0), cpws, c2), cress, c5)))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c0, cfrlm, c2))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c4))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(c4, co(co(cfv(crglmod, c0), cpws, c2), cress, c5), co(c0, cdsmm, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0)))), co(co(cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, c0)), cprds, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0)))), cress, c5), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  syl5eq(co(c0, cdsmm, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0)))), co(co(cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, c0)), cprds, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0)))), cress, c5), co(co(c0, cprds, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0)))), cress, cfv(cbs, co(c0, cdsmm, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0)))))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  dsmmval2(c0, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))), cfv(cbs, co(c0, cdsmm, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))))))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cdsmm, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))))))
  oveq12d(co(c0, cprds, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0)))), cress, cfv(cbs, co(c0, cdsmm, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))))), co(cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, c0)), cprds, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0)))), c5, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  oveq1d(c0, cprds, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))), cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(c0, cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, c0))))
  rlmsca(c0, c1)
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cdsmm, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))))), c5, cfv(cbs, c4), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  fveq2d(cbs, co(c0, cdsmm, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0)))), c4, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  eqcomd(co(c0, cdsmm, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0)))), c4, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  frlmval(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  oveq1d(co(cfv(crglmod, c0), cpws, c2), cress, c5, co(cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, c0)), cprds, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0)))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(co(cfv(crglmod, c0), cpws, c2), co(cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, c0)), cprds, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))))))
  mpan(wcel(c2, c3), wceq(co(cfv(crglmod, c0), cpws, c2), co(cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, c0)), cprds, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))))), wcel(cfv(crglmod, c0), universe))
  fvex(crglmod, c0)
  pwsval(cfv(crglmod, c0), universe, c2, c3, co(cfv(crglmod, c0), cpws, c2), cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, c0)))
  eqid(co(cfv(crglmod, c0), cpws, c2))
  eqid(cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, c0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm frlmpws(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí c4 =(((ringLMod ` c0)[^]c2)[|`s]c5))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(c0[freeLMod]c2)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(Base ` c4)
} = {
  3eqtr4d(c4, (((ringLMod ` c0)[^]c2)[|`s]c5), (c0[(+)m](c2 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)})), (((Scalar `(ringLMod ` c0))[√ó](c2 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)}))[|`s]c5), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  syl5eq((c0[(+)m](c2 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)})), (((Scalar `(ringLMod ` c0))[√ó](c2 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)}))[|`s]c5), ((c0[√ó](c2 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)}))[|`s](Base `(c0[(+)m](c2 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)})))), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  dsmmval2(c0, (c2 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)}), (Base `(c0[(+)m](c2 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)}))))
  eqid((Base `(c0[(+)m](c2 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)}))))
  oveq12d((c0[√ó](c2 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)})), cress, (Base `(c0[(+)m](c2 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)}))), ((Scalar `(ringLMod ` c0))[√ó](c2 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)})), c5, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  oveq1d(c0, cprds, (c2 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)}), (Scalar `(ringLMod ` c0)), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, c0 =(Scalar `(ringLMod ` c0)))
  rlmsca(c0, c1)
  syl6eqr((Base `(c0[(+)m](c2 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)}))), c5, (Base ` c4), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  fveq2d(cbs, (c0[(+)m](c2 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)})), c4, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  eqcomd((c0[(+)m](c2 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)})), c4, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  frlmval(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  oveq1d(((ringLMod ` c0)[^]c2), cress, c5, ((Scalar `(ringLMod ` c0))[√ó](c2 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)})), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  adantl(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, ((ringLMod ` c0)[^]c2)=((Scalar `(ringLMod ` c0))[√ó](c2 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)})))
  mpan(c2 ‚àà c3, ((ringLMod ` c0)[^]c2)=((Scalar `(ringLMod ` c0))[√ó](c2 √ó {(ringLMod ` c0)})), (ringLMod ` c0)‚àà ùïå)
  fvex(crglmod, c0)
  pwsval((ringLMod ` c0), universe, c2, c3, ((ringLMod ` c0)[^]c2), (Scalar `(ringLMod ` c0)))
  eqid(((ringLMod ` c0)[^]c2))
  eqid((Scalar `(ringLMod ` c0)))
}

blocks.name: frlmlss
blocks.content: The base set of the free module is a subspace of the power module. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm frlmlss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, co(c0, cfrlm, c1))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(clss, co(cfv(crglmod, c0), cpws, c1)))
} = {
  eqeltrd(c3, c4, cfv(cbs, co(c0, cdsmm, cxp(c1, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))))), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)))
  syl5eq(c3, cfv(cbs, co(c0, cdsmm, cxp(c1, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))))), cfv(cbs, c5), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)))
  fveq2d(cbs, c5, co(c0, cdsmm, cxp(c1, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0)))), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)))
  frlmval(c0, crg, c1, c2, c5)
  eleqtrd(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cdsmm, cxp(c1, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))))), c4, cfv(clss, co(c0, cprds, cxp(c1, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))))), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)))
  dsmmlss(hs0, cfv(cbs, co(c0, cdsmm, cxp(c1, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))))), cfv(clss, co(c0, cprds, cxp(c1, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))))), c1, c2, c0, cxp(c1, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))), co(c0, cprds, cxp(c1, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0)))), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wf(cxp(c1, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))), c1, clmod), wcel(cfv(crglmod, c0), clmod))
  adantr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(crglmod, c0), clmod))
  rlmlmod(c0)
  fconst6g(cfv(crglmod, c0), clmod, c1)
  eqtr4d(cfv(csca, cfv(cxp(c1, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))), cv(hs0))), c0, cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, c0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  fveq2d(csca, cfv(cxp(c1, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))), cv(hs0)), cfv(crglmod, c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cfv(cxp(c1, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))), cv(hs0)), cfv(crglmod, c0)))
  fvconst2(cv(hs0), c1, cfv(crglmod, c0))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(c0, cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, c0))))
  eqid(co(c0, cprds, cxp(c1, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0)))))
  eqid(cfv(clss, co(c0, cprds, cxp(c1, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))))))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, co(c0, cdsmm, cxp(c1, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))))))
  syl6eqr(cfv(clss, co(c0, cprds, cxp(c1, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))))), c4, cfv(clss, co(cfv(crglmod, c0), cpws, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)))

blocks.name: frlmpwsfi
blocks.content: The finite free module is a power of the ring module. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Feb-2015.)

thm frlmpwsfi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfn)), wceq(c3, co(cfv(crglmod, c0), cpws, c2)))

} = {
  3eqtr4d(c3, co(cfv(crglmod, c0), cpws, c2), co(c0, cdsmm, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0)))), co(cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, c0)), cprds, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0)))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfn)))
  eqtrd(co(c0, cdsmm, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0)))), co(cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, c0)), cprds, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0)))), co(c0, cprds, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0)))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfn)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfn), wceq(co(c0, cdsmm, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0)))), co(c0, cprds, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))))))
  mpan(wcel(c2, cfn), wceq(co(c0, cdsmm, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0)))), co(c0, cprds, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))))), wfn(cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))), c2))
  ax-mp(wfn(cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))), c2), wcel(cfv(crglmod, c0), universe))
  fnconstg(cfv(crglmod, c0), universe, c2)
  dsmmfi(cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))), c2, c0)
  oveq1d(c0, cprds, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))), cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfn)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfn), wceq(c0, cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, c0))))
  rlmsca(c0, c1)
  frlmval(c0, c1, c2, cfn, c3)
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfn), wceq(co(cfv(crglmod, c0), cpws, c2), co(cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, c0)), cprds, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))))))
  mpan(wcel(c2, cfn), wceq(co(cfv(crglmod, c0), cpws, c2), co(cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, c0)), cprds, cxp(c2, csn(cfv(crglmod, c0))))), wcel(cfv(crglmod, c0), universe))
  fvex(crglmod, c0)
  pwsval(cfv(crglmod, c0), universe, c2, cfn, co(cfv(crglmod, c0), cpws, c2), cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, c0)))
  eqid(co(cfv(crglmod, c0), cpws, c2))
  eqid(cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, c0)))
}

thm frlmsca(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  mpan(wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, c0)), cfv(csca, co(cfv(crglmod, c0), cpws, c2))), wcel(cfv(crglmod, c0), universe))
  fvex(crglmod, c0)

  eqid(co(cfv(crglmod, c0), cpws, c2))
  eqid(cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, c0)))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(csca, co(cfv(crglmod, c0), cpws, c2)), cfv(csca, co(co(cfv(crglmod, c0), cpws, c2), cress, cfv(cbs, c4)))), wcel(cfv(cbs, c4), universe))
  fvex(cbs, c4)

  eqid(cfv(csca, co(cfv(crglmod, c0), cpws, c2)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(c0, cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, c0))))
  rlmsca(c0, c1)
  fveq2d(csca, c4, co(co(cfv(crglmod, c0), cpws, c2), cress, cfv(cbs, c4)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))

  sylan(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(cfv(crglmod, c0), cpws, c1), clmod), wcel(cfv(crglmod, c0), clmod))
  pwslmod(cfv(crglmod, c0), c1, c2, co(cfv(crglmod, c0), cpws, c1))
  frlmlss(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cbs, c4), cfv(clss, co(cfv(crglmod, c0), cpws, c1)), c4)

  3syl(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cfv(crglmod, c0), cmnd), wcel(cfv(crglmod, c0), clmod), wcel(cfv(crglmod, c0), cgrp))
  rlmlmod(c0)

blocks.name: frlmelbas
blocks.content: Membership in the base set of the free module. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Feb-2015.) (Revised by AV, 23-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm frlmelbas(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wcel(c4, c5), wa(wcel(c4, co(c6, cmap, c2)), wbr(c4, cfsupp, c7))))
  -| wceq(c8, co(c0, cfrlm, c2))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c8))
} = {
  syl6bb(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c4, c5), wa(wcel(c4, co(c6, cmap, c2)), wbr(c4, cfsupp, c7)), wcel(c4, crab(hs0, co(c6, cmap, c2), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, c7))))
  eleq2d(c4, c5, crab(hs0, co(c6, cmap, c2), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, c7)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  syl6reqr(c5, crab(hs0, co(c6, cmap, c2), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, c7)), cfv(cbs, c8), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  frlmbas(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, crab(hs0, co(c6, cmap, c2), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, c7)), c8, c6, c7)
  eqid(crab(hs0, co(c6, cmap, c2), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, c7)))
  elrab(hs0, c4, co(c6, cmap, c2), wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, c7), wbr(c4, cfsupp, c7))
  breq1(cv(hs0), c4, cfsupp, c7)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
  diff.hs0.c(c7)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c6, cmap, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c4, cfsupp, c7))
}

thm frlmelbas(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c4 ‚àà c5 ‚Üî(c4 ‚àà(c6[‚Ü¶]c2)‚àß c4[finSupp]c7)))
  ‚ä£ c8 =(c0[freeLMod]c2)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c7 =(0 ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(Base ` c8)
} = {
  syl6bb((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), c4 ‚àà c5, (c4 ‚àà(c6[‚Ü¶]c2)‚àß c4[finSupp]c7), c4 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà(c6[‚Ü¶]c2)| hs0[finSupp]c7 })
  eleq2d(c4, c5, { hs0 ‚àà(c6[‚Ü¶]c2)| hs0[finSupp]c7 }, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  syl6reqr(c5, { hs0 ‚àà(c6[‚Ü¶]c2)| hs0[finSupp]c7 }, (Base ` c8), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  frlmbas(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, { hs0 ‚àà(c6[‚Ü¶]c2)| hs0[finSupp]c7 }, c8, c6, c7)
  eqid({ hs0 ‚àà(c6[‚Ü¶]c2)| hs0[finSupp]c7 })
  elrab(hs0, c4, (c6[‚Ü¶]c2), hs0[finSupp]c7, c4[finSupp]c7)
  breq1(hs0, c4, cfsupp, c7)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)

  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c((c6[‚Ü¶]c2))
  diff.hs0.w(c4[finSupp]c7)
}

blocks.name: frlmrcl
blocks.content: If a free module is inhabited, this is sufficient to conclude that the ring expression defines a set. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Feb-2015.)

blocks.name: frlmbasfsupp
blocks.content: Elements of the free module are finitely supported. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Feb-2015.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Jun-2019.) (Proof shortened by AV, 20-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm frlmbasfsupp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wbr(c2, cfsupp, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, co(c6, cfrlm, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c6))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c5))
} = {
  simprd(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wbr(c2, cfsupp, c4), wcel(c2, co(cfv(cbs, c6), cmap, c0)))
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c2, co(cfv(cbs, c6), cmap, c0)), wbr(c2, cfsupp, c4)), wcel(c2, c3))
  simpr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))
  syl2an2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wb(wcel(c2, c3), wa(wcel(c2, co(cfv(cbs, c6), cmap, c0)), wbr(c2, cfsupp, c4))), wcel(c6, universe), wcel(c0, c1))
  frlmrcl(c2, c3, c6, c5, c0)
  simpl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))
  frlmelbas(c6, universe, c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(cbs, c6), c4, c5)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c6))
}

thm frlmbasfsupp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí c2[finSupp]c4)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(c6[freeLMod]c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(0 ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Base ` c5)
} = {
  simprd((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), c2[finSupp]c4, c2 ‚àà((Base ` c6)[‚Ü¶]c0))
  mpbid((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), (c2 ‚àà((Base ` c6)[‚Ü¶]c0)‚àß c2[finSupp]c4), c2 ‚àà c3)
  simpr(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3)
  syl2an2(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, (c2 ‚àà c3 ‚Üî(c2 ‚àà((Base ` c6)[‚Ü¶]c0)‚àß c2[finSupp]c4)), c6 ‚àà ùïå, c0 ‚àà c1)
  frlmrcl(c2, c3, c6, c5, c0)
  simpl(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3)
  frlmelbas(c6, universe, c0, c1, c2, c3, (Base ` c6), c4, c5)
  eqid((Base ` c6))
}

blocks.name: frlmbasmap
blocks.content: Elements of the free module are set functions. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Feb-2015.) (Proof shortened by AV, 21-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm frlmbasmap(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c2, co(c4, cmap, c0)))
  -| wceq(c5, co(c6, cfrlm, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c5))
} = {
  simpld(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c2, co(c4, cmap, c0)), wbr(c2, cfsupp, cfv(c0g, c6)))
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c2, co(c4, cmap, c0)), wbr(c2, cfsupp, cfv(c0g, c6))), wcel(c2, c3))
  simpr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))
  syl2an2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wb(wcel(c2, c3), wa(wcel(c2, co(c4, cmap, c0)), wbr(c2, cfsupp, cfv(c0g, c6)))), wcel(c6, universe), wcel(c0, c1))
  frlmrcl(c2, c3, c6, c5, c0)
  simpl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))
  frlmelbas(c6, universe, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, cfv(c0g, c6), c5)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c6))
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí c2 ‚àà(c4[‚Ü¶]c0))

  frlmrcl(c2, c3, c6, c5, c0)
  simpl(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3)
  frlmelbas(c6, universe, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, (0 ` c6), c5)
  eqid((0 ` c6))
}

blocks.name: frlmbasf
blocks.content: Elements of the free module are functions. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Feb-2015.)

blocks.name: frlmlvec
blocks.content: The free module over a division ring is a left vector space. (Contributed by Steven Nguyen, 29-Apr-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm frlmlvec(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, clvec))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c0, cfrlm, c1))
} = {

blocks.name: frlmsslss
blocks.content: A subset of a free module obtained by restricting the support set is a submodule. ` J ` is the set of forbidden unit vectors. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Feb-2015.)

blocks.name: mpt2frlmd
blocks.content: Elements of the free module are mappings with two arguments defined by their operation values. (Contributed by AV, 20-Feb-2019.) (Proof shortened by AV, 3-Jul-2022.)

thm mpt2frlmd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, class c10, class c11, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3)), wral(s2, c1, wral(s3, c2, wceq(co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s3)), c4)))))
  -| wceq(c5, co(c6, cfrlm, cxp(c1, c2)))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wi(wa(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s3), cv(s1))), wceq(c4, c3))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s3), c2)), wcel(c4, c8))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wcel(c3, c9))
  -| wi(w0, w3a(wcel(c1, c10), wcel(c2, c11), wcel(c0, c7)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
  -| diffsw(s3, w0)
} = {
  fnmpt2ovd(s0, s1, s2, s3, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c8, c9, w0)
  3syl(w0, wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cxp(c1, c2), universe), wcel(c0, c7)), wf(c0, cxp(c1, c2), cfv(cbs, c6)))
  syl(w0, wa(wcel(cxp(c1, c2), universe), wcel(c0, c7)), w3a(wcel(c1, c10), wcel(c2, c11), wcel(c0, c7)))

  anim1i(wa(wcel(c1, c10), wcel(c2, c11)), wcel(c0, c7), wcel(cxp(c1, c2), universe))
  xpexg(c1, c10, c2, c11)
  frlmbasf(cxp(c1, c2), universe, c0, c7, cfv(cbs, c6), c5, c6)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c6))
  ffn(c0, cxp(c1, c2), cfv(cbs, c6))

blocks.name: frlmphl
blocks.content: Conditions for a free module to be a pre-Hilbert space. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Jun-2019.) (Proof shortened by AV, 21-Jul-2019.)
